*Contacting you at inconvenient times or places, such as at work or in front of your family
*Contacting third parties, such as friends or neighbors, to obtain information about you
*Threatening to report you to credit bureaus or law enforcement if you do not pay the debt
*Using false or misleading representations to collect a debt
*Engaging in unfair or deceptive practices to collect a debt
